String.string: The Last Thing We Wanted to See
Be careful. No one knows what might come out.
Do you think the argons are really in league with the cultists?
Use the Seal Deactivation Scroll to remove the Eldritch Seal. [You must select Cultists' Refuge (Solo) from {@LinkCreature:225#1023#Runha} to advance this quest.]
Eliminate the creatures inside the Chamber of Wonder. [You must select Cultists' Refuge (Solo) from {@LinkCreature:225#1023#Runha} to advance this quest.]
